text: Fujitsu is a Japanese company that specializes in semiconductors, computers (supercomputers, personal computers, servers), telecommunications, and services. It is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. == Related pages== *British Post Office scandal, and the Fujitsu-owned company ICL Pathway == References == == Other websites == * Category:1935 establishments in Japan Category:Technology companies of Japan Category:Electronics companies of Japan Category:Companies listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange Category:Companies based in Tokyo
title: Fujitsu
